segments.text: I watch the water overflow from the sink, creating a small lake on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman continues drying her plate, utterly unaware of the flood beneath her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s like watching a ticking time bomb; how can she not see it?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a sense of dread whenever I glance at the boy on the stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s inching closer to those cookies, his focus is unwavering.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl beside him is practically glowing with excitement.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet I feel this mix of amusement and horror at the entire situation.
segments.speaker: PAR
